text: John Blake Rice (May 28, 1809 - December 17, 1874) was an American actor, theatrical producer and politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1865â€“1869). He was a Republican. Rice was born in Easton, Maryland on May 28, 1809. He was raised in Annapolis, Maryland and in Chicago, Illinois. Rice died on December 17, 1874 in Norfolk, Virginia from liver cancer, aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1809 births Category:1874 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Chicago Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Maryland Category:American stage actors Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from Maryland Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Blake Rice
